dignity.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the ability to behave in a calm controlled way even in a difficult situation
dignity.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The family faced their ordeal with dignity.
dignity.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the fact of being respected or deserving respect
dignity.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Prisoners should be treated with regard for human dignity.
Patients should be allowed to die with dignity.
